Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
Person
Instructor
Teacher
Direct Known Subclasses:
GUITrainer, OOTrainer
public class Teacher
extends Instructor
This class defines a Teacher object. It provides all the properties and methods necessary to manage a teacher in the bigger context of the School. Each teacher, inherits its properties and methods from Person and Instructor. Each teacher wll be able to teach subjects that require level of specialism 1 and 2.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Giovanni Arcudi

  • Method Details

    • canTeach

      public boolean canTeach​(Subject subject)
      Tells if the teacher can teach the Subject passed as parameter or not.
      Specified by:
      canTeach in class Instructor
      Parameters:
      subject - the subject we want to check if can be taught by the teacher
      Returns:
      true if the teacher can teach the input subject (Subject's specialism ID = 1 or 2), false otherwise
